column1: Pasuruan (Dutch: Pasoeroean) is a city in East Java
column3: Indonesia. It had a population of 186
column4: 262 at the 2010 Census; the latest official estimate (as of January 2014) was 191

column3: Pasuruan Regency. It is located around 65 kilometers southeast of Surabaya.
